casebody.data:
Mary G. POTTER, as Trustee, etc., Plaintiff-Appellee, v. Frank WALKER, Defendant-Appellant. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. November 6, 1924.) No. 178. See, also, 1 F.(2d) 416. Charles S. Aronstam, of New York City, for appellant. William Lesser, of New York City, for appellee.

Before HOUGH and MANTON, Circuit Judges, and LEARNED HAND, District Judge.

PER CURIAM.

Decree (2 F.[2d] 774) affirmed.
